name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Japanese Emoticons: Kaomoji And Text Faces

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Japanese Emoticons, Kaomoji And Text Faces Copy And Paste. Type Of Emoticons Angry, Cute, Kiss, Happy And More.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Japanese emoticons ( kaomoji ) grouped into categories. Just choose the emoticon that you like and that are automatically copied to the clipboard and are available for use in social media, text messages, comments, chating  and anywhere.
